name: Unlimited Saga
synopsis: In Unlimited Saga, several adventurers embark on a journey to conquer The Seven Wonders: a group of ancient structures shrouded in mystery. The Seven Wonders are scattered across parched deserts, frigid tundra, harsh mountains and raging seas. All remnants of a time when evil forces ran amok. Play as any character including a former pirate, an inventor, a knight and a tribesman. Embark on an open-ended adventure that's shaped by your own choices allowing the world and its characters to constantly evolve.
